title: Asia's factories end 2025 on firmer footing as orders pick up
description: SINGAPORE — Asia’s factory powerhouses closed 2025 on a firmer footing, with activity swinging back to growth in several key economies as export orders picked up, helped by new product launches and blistering demand for artificial intelligence (AI).

title: Elon Musk chatbot Grok notes safeguard lapses
description: Elon Musk’s xAI artificial intelligence chatbot Grok said on Friday lapses in safeguards had resulted in “images depicting minors in minimal clothing” on social media platform X and that improvements were being made to prevent this.
content:

title: Six technology trends shaping 2026
description: AS the world enters 2026, global science and technology experiments are entering a more pragmatic phase. After years defined by experimental breakthroughs and headline-driven innovation, 2026 is shaping up as a year focused less on novelty and more on deployment. Across artificial intelligence, clean energy, cybersecurity, medicine, and astronomy, scientific advances are beginning to integrate into industrial systems, public infrastructure, and policy frameworks.

title: French ministers report Grok's sex-related content on the X platform to prosecutors
description: French ministers have reported to prosecutors sexually explicit content generated by Elon Musk's xAI artificial intelligence chatbot Grok on the X platform, saying in a statement on Friday the "sexual and sexist" content was "manifestly illegal".

title: SEBI Developing AI-Powered Cybersecurity Tool For Market Entities
description: SEBI Chairman Tuhin Kanta Pandey on Friday said the capital markets regulator is in the process of developing an artificial intelligence-powered tool to analyse regulated entities' cyber safety preparedness. Speaking at the BSE here, Pandey also said SEBI is in the process of constituting a working group to develop a technology roadmap for market infrastructure institutions (MIIs).
